postContent:
![Balance 20X Testimonial-15.png|2954x2954, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1675070365617.png) 

Why is it so important to have a capable router? Because it may save you from great losses that could happen when your Internet goes down. Check out what this SMB owner said about the Peplink’s Balance 20X.

[Learn More](https://www.peplink.com/products/balance-20x/)

replies.postContent:
![IoT Evolution Expo-03.png|5334x2356](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1675762913724.png) 

Want to take a closer look at the Balance 20X LoRaWAN or other innovations from Peplink that can power up your IoT networks? 
GetWireless and FrontierUS will both be exhibiting at the IoT Evolution Expo this February 14th-17th. Grab the chance to talk to GetWireless at Booth #911 and chat with FrontierUS at Booth #934! There are surely a lot you don’t want to miss.

![Valentine's Day-20-20.png|2953x2954, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1676369230136.png) 

Chocolates, flowers, candlelight dinner… What else? Umm… How about watching an in-depth webinar or participating in an insightful event together? Professor P. from West Networks will soon go live for his lesson on InTouch this Valentine’s Day morning. GetWireless and FrontierUS will also start their show at the IoT Evolution Expo on Feb 14. Make this special day as fulfilling as how romantic it is!

[Register for the Webinar](https://us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_o-ZyrPZcTwqFgRNjUYQpLA)

[Learn More About the Expo](https://www.iotevolutionexpo.com/east/)

![LoRaWAN-61.png|2501x2501, 50%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1677492375261.png) 
![LoRaWAN-62.png|2501x2501, 50%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1677492377976.png) 
![LoRaWAN-63.png|2501x2501, 50%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1677492381792.png) 
![LoRaWAN-64.png|2501x2501, 50%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1677492384470.png) 
![LoRaWAN-65.png|2501x2501, 50%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1677492387214.png) 
![LoRaWAN-66.png|2501x2501, 50%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1677492434146.png) 
![LoRaWAN-67.png|2501x2501, 50%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1677492397995.png) 

When everything is Going Smart, the way you connect them to the Internet can also be smarter. LoRaWAN allows you to connect your sensors over a large area to the Internet in a more economical and less power-consuming way. And now, this is achievable with our Balance 20X and FlexModule Mini LoRaWAN combo! Build a large-scale IoT network with LoRaWAN and make it more reliable and manageable with SpeedFusion.

[Learn More](https://www.peplink.com/products/balance-20x-lorawan-with-flexmodule-mini/)

![B20X Review-17-17.png|2954x2954, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1677567802892.png) 

Since haydenjames.io found the Balance 20X, everything has changed. No more “clumsy automatic failover”, and there are loads of configuration options for him to optimize network performance and reliability. Check out what more he said about the Balance 20X in the article.

[Read Now](https://haydenjames.io/peplink-balance-20x-router-review/)

![EMEAAPAC-Firmware-830-webinar-2.png|1920x1080](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1677732195286.png) 

With Firmware 8.3.0 just recently released, there’s no better way to get yourself acquainted than by joining our upcoming webinar. Together with Joey Janssen from Frontier BV, we’ll be exploring in detail what new and improved features this firmware update has to offer.

Supercharge your knowledge on Firmware 8.3.0 to supercharge your connectivity setup!

[Register Now](https://us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_uym3hQHwSief4GldrUXY_Q)

![LinkedInTeaser-BOne5g.png|1920x1080](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1678960162977.png) 

Looking to bring high quality voice / video calls into your office? Or maybe need a reliable companion for your multiple broadband connections?

The search is over, because Peplink’s got the one thing you need: B One (5G). Coming soon!

![A Beginner's Guide to Choosing a LoRaWAN Gateway-71.png|5001x2501, 100%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1679285409731.png) 
![A Beginner's Guide to Choosing a LoRaWAN Gateway-72.png|5001x2501](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1679285413465.png) 
![A Beginner's Guide to Choosing a LoRaWAN Gateway-73.png|5002x2501](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1679285419813.png) 
![A Beginner's Guide to Choosing a LoRaWAN Gateway-74.png|5101x2501](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1679285426902.png) 

Adapting LoRaWAN to your IoT network is a great idea, but, as a beginner, how to choose the right LoRaWAN gateway? Here you go - a guide you definitely don’t want to miss! In addition to those basic functionalities, there are also some advanced capabilities your gateways should have to prevent any headaches in the future. Check out this guide now!

[Learn More](https://www.peplink.com/products/balance-20x-lorawan-with-flexmodule-mini/)

![NAB show 2023-36.png|3815x2476, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1679389331698.png) 

It’s okay! All the jitters, latency and disruptions belong to the past. Smooth, instantaneous and continuous video streams are what’s at hand if you meet West Networks at Booth #W3067, the NAB Show! Grab this chance to take a closer look at our latest products and experience the power of Peplink’s upgraded software features from April 15th-19th. They have supercharged live streaming and broadcasting of some of the world’s highest-profile events, and they are also ready to supercharge yours.

![Balance20X review-21.png|2954x2953, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1679478839839.png) 

A device with wide versatility while possessing a user-friendly interface - this is how a Principal Network Engineer and Architect with over 30 years of experience describes our Balance 20X. After being frustrated by many routers, either consumer-grade or prosumer-grade, he finally found the one that has the advantages of both. Check out what else he said about it!

[![YouTube Cover.png|1800x1011](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1679643483553.png) ](https://youtu.be/GMCyxaSeU34)

Get to know the most effective ways to solve the issues your customers are facing when it comes to the connectivity of their surveillance systems! Peplink’s vast portfolio of devices enables you to provide customized solutions for users in different situations no matter which level of connectivity they are looking for, from basic to mission-critical. Here’s an overview of the four typical combinations for surveillance applications provided by Michael Maitland from FrontierUS and Travis Durick. 

[Watch the Recording Now](https://youtu.be/GMCyxaSeU34)

![Starlink & Peplink-86.png|2501x2501, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1679909486309.png) 
![Starlink & Peplink-87.png|5001x2501](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1679909492433.png) 
![Starlink & Peplink-88.png|5001x2501](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1679909496857.png) 
![Starlink & Peplink-89.png|5001x2501](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1679909501600.png) 

Low Earth Orbit (LEO) internet and cellular internet are not the alternative to each other. The former enables you to have internet access at even an extremely remote location, and the latter keeps you connected even when there are plenty of obstructions in the view of the sky. That’s why a big fan of Starlink also uses Peplink while on the go. Their complementary abilities allow them to bring the highest possible uptime to you together.

Read this article from FulfillingTravel now for a deeper understanding of Starlink, and why a Starlink user still needs Peplink.

[Read Now](https://www.fulfillingtravel.com/starlink-internet-guide/)

![HannoverMesse2023.png|1920x1080](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1680580400671.png) 

Are you ready to transform with the industry? **HANNOVER MESSE 2023** is coming soon, exhibiting industrial solutions from the experts. With **Ericsson** as one of the industrial pioneers, their stand will feature Peplink’s 5G portfolio. Visit them at Hannover Fairground **Hall 14, Stand H38** to learn more about how Peplink can supercharge your private or industrial network.

![JMG 1.png|1024x576, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1680770428013.png) 
![JMG 3.png|2661x1774, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1680770431656.png) 
![JMG 4.png|1824x2736, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1680770431809.png) 

More than ten years ago, Jerry McLarty found Peter West and chose Peplink for the mission-critical connectivity he needed while serving people in rural areas from his mobile mammography vehicle. The mobile medical unit has gone through several network upgrades, but it has always been with Peplink.

Jerry’s passion for mobilizing healthcare, Peter’s passion for solving connectivity problems, and their trust in Peplink led to the creation of the Jerry McLarty Grant four years ago. This is the fifth year of the program, and we’re proud to support it.

The Jerry McLarty Grant will be awarded at the annual Mobile Health Clinics Conference in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania September 9-12, 2023. The recipient of the Grant will receive a set of Peplink products with free installation and technical support provided by West Networks. 

Learn more about the Grant and how to apply for it now.

[Learn More](https://westnetworks.com/2023/03/27/the-jerry-mclarty-connectivity-grant/)

![B20X & SFC APP REVIEW-22.png|2954x2954, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1681272937704.png) 

The Balance 20X is certainly a versatile device, capable of improving the quality of your Zoom calls while distributing network traffic to paths that provide different levels of protection. But, it is not difficult to set up or manage with the SFC App. Check out what our user has to say about the device and the app. 

Find out more if you want to give it a try.

[Learn More](https://www.peplink.com/products/speedfusion-connect-and-balance-20x/)

[![PvU_Hot-Failover_040.png|1920x1080](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1681811478603.png) ](https://collection.peplink.com/media/failover_hot_vs_cold.m4v)

The gap when you switch to an alternative connection can lead to serious consequences, just as what the delivery robot Udther experienced. And a seamless backup, can save your mission-critical applications from disruption. So, cold or hot, which do you prefer?

Check the video out now and tell us your choice in the comment!

[Watch Now](https://collection.peplink.com/media/failover_hot_vs_cold.m4v)

![HannoverMesse2023-Post2-1.png|1920x1080](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1681948762244.png) 
![HannoverMesse2023-Post2-2.png|1920x1080](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1681948762036.png) 

HANNOVER MESSE 2023 is here! Ericsson’s stand has been busy these past few days to introduce to you how partners in the Industry 4.0 ecosystem, such as Peplink, can supercharge your industrial networks. Curious to know what 5G routers Peplink has in store? Until April 21, you can still visit Ericsson at Hall 14, Stand H38 to learn more. Grab the chance to drop by while you still can!

![peplink_accelerate_partner_summit_2-39.png|3815x2476, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1683003477054.png) 

What can you get out of the Peplink and FrontierUS Partner Summit?
 
From business to technology innovations, you can get everything you want from this 3-day summit. In addition to speeches from various guest speakers, there will also be expert panel discussions on the second and third days. If you want to act in advance with some market insights, join us. If you want to learn about the latest innovations in different sectors, such as maritime, MSPs and security, join us. If you want the opportunity to communicate face-to-face with the leadership team, join us.

Check the summit agenda out for more information.

[Check the Agenda](https://cdn1.frontiercomputercorp.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/13122458/Partner-Summit-Agenda-6.pdf)

Sign up now and you won’t regret it.

[Sign up](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdrsUWxJxFCpx4HTAZVdNf-lpO8xICggpj33DpifIx973ghSg/viewform)

[![Challenges for BFSI0.png|1920x1080, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1683693861010.png) ](https://collection.peplink.com/media/challenges_for_bfsi.m4v)

Why, why, why? Why do I always experience connectivity problems when I'm at the bank, whether at the head office, branches, ATMs or at the roadshow site? 🤔 Do you have the same question as George, or is this a headache you want to solve?

Well, you need some help from Peplink. 😉 With us, you no longer have to suffer from stuttering video calls, long processing time, or connectivity issues in general.

Stay tuned! 📢

[![BSFI_thumbnail.png|1920x1080, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1684316194003.png) ](https://collection.peplink.com/media/peplink_supercharges_banking_financial_services_and_insurance.m4v)

Choppy and pixelated video conferencing at your headquarters. ❌ 
Long loading screens and wait times at your branches. ❌ 
ATMs that don’t work. ❌
Roadshows that are anything but interactive and smooth. ❌
More business innovation and improved agility driven by fast and reliable connectivity. ✅  

Don't let connectivity issues get in the way of serving your customers. Make them a thing of the past! Watch the video now to learn how Peplink helps you secure your BFSI organizations with reliable connectivity.

[Watch Now](https://youtu.be/tUIjifdL82s)

There’s a lot to consider when you try to find the right gear to provide the best possible Wi-Fi connections at your place. But if you go through these points, you will find that the BR1 Pro 5G can meet all of your needs and provide you with even more. Brandon couldn’t help but recommend it, even though he was writing an article for Best Wi-Fi Hotspot and the BR1 Pro 5G is not literally one.

So, why settle for a Wi-Fi hotspot when you can get the full suite?

[Read the article now](https://www.yahoo.com/lifestyle/best-wi-fi-hotspots-road-152005861.html?guccounter=1&guce_referrer=aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuZ29vZ2xlLmNvbS8&guce_referrer_sig=AQAAAElnTu7yGzLcmFH9NAEd7eW0XIcIUcRsZFA0-p4lokadFoAbBGmsb0P6mZhZtghYTHqXv3MlS67okM2sASYgnOl4ngNH_ahN6Gca6ilYANCT9NRAxvt3eqsjkn3btb0uMueBLcHUGiPmKBXa0FWrsRZkBgAA2QZxhp20szBkBl6j)

[Learn more about the BR1 Pro 5G](https://www.peplink.com/products/max-br1-pro-5g/)

![Know IT event-41.png|4688x1928, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1685440478550.png) 

The yachting season has begun! Are you thinking about upgrading the network on board your superyachts or even special purpose vessels? Meet our partner Know IT at Salone Nautico Venezia or Seafuture! They will be bringing Peplink’s latest devices and technologies to these shows to show you their incredible power. Don’t miss this chance! Check the details in the image.

![Q&A-01.jpg|2048x2048, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1686045020095.jpg) 
![Q&A-02.jpg|2048x2048, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1686045020303.jpg) 
![Q&A-03.jpg|2048x2048, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1686045020375.jpg) 
![Q&A-04.jpg|2048x2048, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1686045020595.jpg) 

Your landlord won't let you add a second broadband line to your office? Or you don't have time to wait for the installation to be completed? Just use the BR1 Pro 5G as a 5G adapter to add 5G to your enterprise network. It gives you faster speeds, with much easier setup, but at a much lower price. 

[Learn More](https://www.peplink.com/products/max-br1-pro-5g/)

![lorawan webinar.png|2679x1339, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1686126885198.png) 

Not everything is born smart. But you can still connect them, make them part of your IoT network, with sensors, in a more effective way. Join our upcoming webinar on June 20th to have a better understanding of LoRaWAN and how it can help you build an economical and power-saving IoT network. Learn how Peplink helps overcome common challenges in LoRaWAN applications, making them more reliable and manageable.

Being smart is an inheritance, but becoming smart is a choice. Don’t miss the chance.

[Register Now](https://us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/1116837661197/WN_E4mbrMY2TLW8g-Y_wPNqNg)

![pcss-webinar_02.png|2880x1620](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1686210350421.png) 

Want a badge like this for yourself? Equip yourself with the knowledge to provide the best fit for any deployment. Join us on June 21st to better prepare yourself for the PCSS exam if you haven’t taken it, or to simply pick up new tips for future courses! 

Don’t let this chance pass so you can pass the PCSS Exam with flying colors!

[Register now](https://bit.ly/42vL1Bh)

[![PvU_bandwidth bonding_031.png|1920x1080, 100%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1686624585445.png) ](https://collection.peplink.com/media/bonding_slow_in_parallel_vs_fast_as_one.m4v)

Staying together, but still separate 😢 - that’s what annoyed Udther, but never a concern for Peplink. With Bandwidth Bonding, Peplink can always create a real bond, even when there are different types of Internet sources and a lot of them. 

Watch the video now to see how the real bond helps the crew of a large cruise ship stay connected to their loved ones!

[Watch Now](https://collection.peplink.com/media/bonding_slow_in_parallel_vs_fast_as_one.m4v)

![BR1-Pro-5G-Q&A_2nd_Page01.png|8534x8534, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1686733253132.png) 
![BR1-Pro-5G-Q&A_2nd_Page02.png|8534x8534, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1686733258517.png) 
![BR1-Pro-5G-Q&A_2nd_Page03.png|8535x8534, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1686733262740.png) 
![BR1-Pro-5G-Q&A_2nd_Page04.png|8534x8534, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1686733273176.png) 

Thinking about bringing 5G indoors with the BR1 Pro 5G to improve your business network, but still wondering if it’s worth it? Don't forget - the BR1 Pro 5G is a powerful router (or you can call it a gateway) by nature. The wide range of bands it supports allows you to enjoy mid-band 5G (e.g. Verizon’s C-band) in your office, making more business innovation possible. 

[Learn More](https://www.peplink.com/products/max-br1-pro-5g/)

![Which of the following it true about LoRaWAN-100.png|2507x2508, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1686880536689.png) 
![Which of the following it true about LoRaWAN-101.png|2508x2508, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1686880540635.png) 
![Which of the following it true about LoRaWAN-102.png|2507x2508, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1686880546513.png) 
![Which of the following it true about LoRaWAN-103.png|2508x2508, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1686880551050.png) 
![Which of the following it true about LoRaWAN-104.png|2507x2508, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1686880555508.png) 
![Which of the following it true about LoRaWAN-105.png|2508x2508, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1686880559778.png) 

The answer is D. 🎉 Couldn’t believe it, right? The record long distance that a LoRa packet travels between a node and a gateway is 832 km! This means that with LoRaWAN, you can install devices like sensors miles away and build up a large-scale IoT network. And with centrally managed gateways (or routers with gateway functionality like Peplink), you can easily scale your IoT network even further.

Find out why other options aren't quite right.

Want to learn more? Register now for our upcoming webinar, Supercharge Your LoRaWAN Network.

[Register Now](https://us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/1116837661197/WN_E4mbrMY2TLW8g-Y_wPNqNg#/registration)

![PCSSReviewWebinarThumbnail.png|1920x1080](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1687492470217.png) 

What kind of questions can be found in the PCSS exam, and what skills are needed when taking it? With our recent webinar, PCSS Question Review: Tips for Identifying and Correcting Common Errors, you can learn new strategies for taking the PCSS exam and avoid making some common mistakes. Review your PCSS exam taking skills with the webinar recording.

[Watch Recording](https://bit.ly/3XqhE2q)

![Q&A_03_01.jpg|2049x2049, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1687513962632.jpg) 
![Q&A_03_02.jpg|2049x2049, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1687513966360.jpg)

![Q&A_03_04.jpg|2049x2049, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1687513972631.jpg) 

Using the BR1 Pro 5G as a 5G adapter or gateway is great, but DON’T stop there. It has the capability to be the command center for your network. Simply install it wherever you want, fixed or mobile, and every WAN source will become just one of the options, working together to create the most reliable network possible. 

Broadband, Starlink, VSAT? They are all "an option". Video conferencing, POS systems, VoIP? They are all protected!

[Learn More](https://www.peplink.com/products/max-br1-pro-5g/)

[![starlink.jpg|1920x1080](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1687858553938.jpg) ](https://collection.peplink.com/media/fix_starlink_connection_issues_with_redundant_connections.m4v)

Wireless connections giving out frequently? Important calls dropping out at the worst possible times? One simple and affordable move can change your situation. Add a Peplink router, even the simplest one, to your Starlink network, and you’ll find yourself free of connection problems.

Watch the video to see how you can easily safeguard your Starlink business network with the Balance 20X.

[Watch the Video](https://collection.peplink.com/media/fix_starlink_connection_issues_with_redundant_connections.m4v)

[Learn More About Starlink with Peplink](https://www.peplink.com/mobility-and-specialized-solutions/starlink-solutions-page/)

![Webinar-IC2webinar.png|1920x959](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1687937175413.png) 

In addition to our devices, a Peplink solution is made complete with our versatile management platform. Through a single screen, InControl 2 offers easy network monitoring and management. And through a single webinar, on July 11th, you can learn more about how InControl 2 helps a Peplink solution stand out, and get to watch a live demo of the platform in action.

It only take a single decision - [register now](https://us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_KT_u6g-ZS_iKgUIDAnGnAA#/registration).

![StarlinkwithPeplink testimonial-23.png|2954x2954, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1688112413504.png) 
![StarlinkwithPeplink testimonial-24.png|2954x2954, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1688112417640.png) 
![StarlinkwithPeplink testimonial-25.png|2953x2954, 75%](https://s3.amazonaws.com/forum.peplink.com/uploads/1688112421739.png) 

A truck camper that every RVer loves should have not only solid construction and cozy living space, but also a robust network that meets on-demand connectivity needs. A typical example is the 2nd place winner of the Top 10 Truck Camper Rigs of the 2023 Overland Expo West.
